name: Robin Sachs
biography: Robin Sachs was born on February 5, 1951 in Hammersmith, London, England as Robin David Sachs. He was an actor, known for Galaxy Quest (1999), The Lost World: Jurassic Park (1997) and Mass Effect 3 (2012). He was married to Casey DeFranco and Siân Phillips. He died on February 1, 2013 in Los Angeles, California, USA.::Anonymous
trivia: Son of actors Leonard Sachs and Eleanor Summerfield.

Best known for his memorable appearances in sci-fi and fantasy, notably on Babylon 5 (1993), Star Trek: Voyager (1995), Buffy the Vampire Slayer (1997) and (as the evil General Sarris) in the movie Galaxy Quest (1999). Often in heavy makeup as assorted alien characters. He has also lent his distinctive voice to many video games.

He and his parents Eleanor Summerfield and Leonard Sachs all appeared in Hammer films: Eleanor in Man Bait (1952), The Black Glove (1954) and Blackout (1954), Leonard in The Men of Sherwood Forest (1954) and Scream of Fear (1961) and Robin in Vampire Circus (1972).
Passed away just four days short of his 62nd birthday.
No relation to Andrew "Manuel" Sachs of *Fawlty Towers* fame, despite a popular misconception.
filmography: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Chaos Bleeds
Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
